action.name: set_variable
action.helper: This action will set a value for a key of a Variable

action.name: remove_money
action.helper: This action will make remove a amount of money

action.name: custom_notification
action.helper:
This action will display Custom Notification.  Type : 
 Undefined = 0,
   Negative = 1,
   Neutral = 2,
   Vehicle = 3,
   Apartment = 4,
   Relic = 5,
   Money = 6,
   Reveal = 7
action.comment: Display notification (needed: subtitles sometimes don't fire)

action.speaker: Receptionist
action.helper: This action will fire a subtitle on your bottom portion of the screen, The duration must complete in order for the next action to call. Type value just keep at 1 for now.
action.name: subtitle
action.title: Sindelicious has been allocated to you, she awaits you in your apartment!
